project.title: Rhonda Lieberman
project.summary: Personal site of Rhonda Lieberman. Reader, writer, friend of animals.
project.alt: Homepage of Rhonda Lieberman's site. There is a picture of her holding a white Chihuahua mix on a chair in front of a restaurant.

project.title: The Cats-in-Residence Program
project.summary: Part purr-formance piece, part social sculpture, part design solution.
project.alt: The Cats-in-Residence Program homepage. The hero area has a picture of a cat sitting on a sculture, the the text: Meow, would you like more rescue cats with your Art?
